20110115070318.000|20110115070320.000|CC1|>>> IT WAS A FREAK ACCIDENT.    
20110115070320.000|20110115070321.000|CC1|THREE MEMBERS OF THE SAME FAMILY
20110115070321.000|20110115070323.000|CC1|WERE KILL THIS MORNING AS THEY  
20110115070323.000|20110115070326.000|CC1|TRIED TO SAVE EACH OTHER.

20110115070328.000|20110115070329.000|CC1|SAME POWER LINE APPARENTLY BLOWN
20110115070329.000|20110115070331.000|CC1|DOWN BY THE WIND.               
20110115070331.000|20110115070333.000|CC1|>> THE TRAGEDY THAT TOOK PLACE  
20110115070333.000|20110115070333.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110115070333.000|20110115070334.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TODAY A LOT OF     
20110115070334.000|20110115070336.000|CC1|PEOPLE ARE WONDERING HOW COULD  
20110115070336.000|20110115070338.000|CC1|SO MANY THINGS GO WRONG FOR ONE 
20110115070338.000|20110115070340.000|CC1|FAMILY WHO LIVED IN THIS NORTH  
20110115070340.000|20110115070341.000|CC1|ACACIA HOME.                    
20110115070341.000|20110115070344.000|CC1|STEVE AND SHARON VEGO AND THEIR 
20110115070344.000|20110115070345.000|CC1|21-YEAR-OLD SON JONATHAN COLD   
20110115070345.000|20110115070346.000|CC1|WERE KILLED EARLY THIS MORNING  
20110115070346.000|20110115070349.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY WERE TRYING TO HELP
20110115070349.000|20110115070349.000|CC1|EACH OTHER.                     
20110115070349.000|20110115070351.000|CC1|IT ALL BEGAN WHEN THE WINDS     
20110115070351.000|20110115070352.000|CC1|KICKED UP EARLY THIS MORNING.   
20110115070352.000|20110115070355.000|CC1|AND DOWNED A 12,000 VOLT POWER  
20110115070355.000|20110115070356.000|CC1|LINE IN THEIR YARD.             
20110115070356.000|20110115070358.000|CC1|THAT STARTED A FIRE.            
20110115070358.000|20110115070400.000|CC1|STEVE VEGO WENT OUTSIDE TO PUT  
20110115070400.000|20110115070402.000|CC1|THE FIRE OUT AND THAT'S WHEN HE 
20110115070402.000|20110115070403.000|CC1|STEPPED ON A POWER LINE.        
20110115070403.000|20110115070406.000|CC1|AS STEVE VEGO'S BROTHER         
20110115070406.000|20110115070408.000|CC1|EXPLAINED, IF THERE THERE WAS A 
20110115070408.000|20110115070410.000|CC1|TRAGIC CHAIN REACTION OF EVENTS.
20110115070410.000|20110115070411.000|CC1|THIS WAS IT.                    
20110115070411.000|20110115070413.000|CC1|>> SHARON SAW THE FIRE IN THE   
20110115070413.000|20110115070414.000|CC1|FRONT SO SHE WENT TO DO.        
20110115070414.000|20110115070415.000|CC1|THAT STEVE GOT THE FIRE IN THE  
20110115070415.000|20110115070417.000|CC1|BACK AND THE WIRE GOT HIM.      
20110115070417.000|20110115070419.000|CC1|IT GOT HER AND THEN JOHNNY WENT 
20110115070419.000|20110115070421.000|CC1|TO HELP AND IT GOT HIM.         
20110115070421.000|20110115070423.000|CC1|>> THEIR DAUGHTER AND SON STAYED
20110115070423.000|20110115070424.000|CC1|INSIDE THE HOME.                
20110115070424.000|20110115070425.000|CC1|THEY WERE NOT INJURED.          
20110115070425.000|20110115070427.000|CC1|RESCUE WORKERS ADMIT THEY WERE  
20110115070427.000|20110115070428.000|CC1|DELAYED IN REACHING THE VICTIMS 
20110115070428.000|20110115070430.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE POWER LINES WERE    
20110115070430.000|20110115070430.000|CC1|STILL ALIVE.                    
20110115070430.000|20110115070432.000|CC1|THE WINDS IN THE AREA HAD BEEN  
20110115070432.000|20110115070433.000|CC1|GUSTING UP TO 50 MILES AN HOUR. 
20110115070433.000|20110115070435.000|CC1|>> IN THE BACKYARD, WERE STILL  
20110115070435.000|20110115070437.000|CC1|LIVE AND WE WERE UNABLE TO GET  
20110115070437.000|20110115070438.000|CC1|CLOSE TO THE VICTIM.            
20110115070438.000|20110115070440.000|CC1|IT WAS DETERMINED AT THAT POINT 
20110115070440.000|20110115070442.000|CC1|THAT THEY WERE DEAD ON OUR      
20110115070442.000|20110115070442.000|CC1|ARRIVAL.                        
20110115070442.000|20110115070445.000|CC1|>> I'M CURIOUS.                 
20110115070445.000|20110115070447.000|CC1|IN THE 202011.                  
20110115070447.000|20110115070448.000|CC1|POWER LINES SHOULDN'T BE CALLING
20110115070448.000|20110115070450.000|CC1|ON PEOPLE'S HOUSES AND KILLING  
20110115070450.000|20110115070450.000|CC1|FAMILIES.                       
20110115070450.000|20110115070451.000|CC1|PERIOD.                         
20110115070451.000|20110115070452.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT A FLUKE.

20110115070559.000|20110115070600.000|CC1|DOLLARS BAIL FOR ALLEGEDLY      
20110115070600.000|20110115070602.000|CC1|BRINGING A GUN AND BOMB MAKING  
20110115070602.000|20110115070604.000|CC1|MATERIALS ON TO THAT CAMPUS.    
20110115070604.000|20110115070606.000|CC1|THIS IS VIDEO.                  
20110115070606.000|20110115070607.000|CC1|22-YEAR-OLD DAVID EVERSON IN    
20110115070607.000|20110115070609.000|CC1|COURT TODAY FOR THE FIRST TIME. 
20110115070609.000|20110115070610.000|CC1|HE IS ACCUSED OF HAVING BOMB    
20110115070610.000|20110115070611.000|CC1|MAKING MATERIALS AND THEN       
20110115070611.000|20110115070613.000|CC1|BRINGING A GUN ON TO CAMPUS.    
20110115070613.000|20110115070616.000|CC1|THE CAMPUS POLICE SAY THEY TOOK 
20110115070616.000|20110115070617.000|CC1|ACTION AFTER SEVERAL STUDENTS   
20110115070617.000|20110115070619.000|CC1|AND FACULTY MEMBERS NOTICED WHAT
20110115070619.000|20110115070621.000|CC1|THEY BELIEVED WAS HIS UNUSUAL   
20110115070621.000|20110115070621.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR.                       
20110115070621.000|20110115070624.000|CC1|>> I HONESTLY THINK THAT IN THIS
20110115070624.000|20110115070628.000|CC1|PARTICULAR CASE, WE AVERTED AT  
20110115070628.000|20110115070631.000|CC1|LEAST A CRITICAL INCIDENT.      
20110115070631.000|20110115070632.000|CC1|>> I'VE NEVER HEARD SOMETHING   
20110115070632.000|20110115070633.000|CC1|CRAZY LIKE THAT.                
20110115070633.000|20110115070636.000|CC1|>> IT MAKES ME FEEL UNSAFE.     
20110115070636.000|20110115070638.000|CC1|>> HE WAS INITIALLY REFERRED TO 
20110115070638.000|20110115070639.000|CC1|COUNSELING BUT THEN THEY HAD A  
20110115070639.000|20110115070640.000|CC1|SEARCH OF HIS DORM ROOM AND     
20110115070640.000|20110115070643.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT TURNED UP THE BANNED
20110115070643.000|20110115070643.000|CC1|ITEMS.                          
20110115070643.000|20110115070644.000|CC1|CAMPUS POLICE CHIEF SAID THE    
20110115070644.000|20110115070647.000|CC1|SCHOOL'S PROCEDURES FOR DEALING 
20110115070647.000|20110115070648.000|CC1|WITH TROUBLED STUDENTS WORKED
